EmailTemplate.description: ICC send this email to inform PGs that we are planning on using an interpreter to carry out MASI call
EmailTemplate.name: 2016 - ICC Interpreter Call - Language Support Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: NCS: Language Support Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your experience is just round the corner
NCS: Professional Feedback Form
Dear {!Contact.Parent_Name__c},
Please find attached the professional/ Specialist feedback form to give to the medical professional working with {!Contact.FirstName} to complete. The information provided on this feedback form will be used to support {!Contact.FirstName} during NCS.
Once completed, please make a copy of the form to keep for your records. and send the original back to us either by scan (or digital photo of each page) to inclusion.support@the-challenge.org
Alternatively you can send this by post addressed to Inclusion and Support Service, Elizabeth House, 39 York Road, London, SE1 7NQ.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us by calling 0333 150 2425 or emailing inclusion.support@the-challenge.org - we’ll be happy to help.
The NCS Team - The Challenge
Please call us on 0333 150 2425 or email us at inclusion.support@the-challenge.org - we’ll be happy to help. Our opening hours are 9am - 7pm Monday to Friday and 10am - 6pm on Saturdays and Sundays.
NCS THE CHALLENGE @NCSTheChallenge NCSThe Challenge @NCSTheChallenge
Copyright © 2016 The Challenge Network, All rights reserved. The Challenge Network is a charity registered in England and Wales with charity no. 1129239 and company no. 6845451, whose registered office is at Elizabeth House, 39 York Road, London SE1 7NQ.
You are receiving this email because you have registered your interest for NCS. Want to update your preferences or unsubscribe? Please contact us.
